name: Flower Defence (Jornam, NaoCuddles)
description:
In Flower Defence, you have to protect your water well from the evil slugs and ants.

You have two towers at your disposal, the mushroom and the sunflower. The mushroom sleeps during the day and is active at night. The sunflower is active during the day but sleeps at night.

But beware! The evil ants and slugs will try to eat your towers when they are sleeping! Protect your towers with...well towers. Good luck!
